item.title: 美国银行聘请摩根士丹利的 Giardinelli 担任自然资源部主管
item.description: 美国银行聘请摩根士丹利的 Todd Giardinelli 担任该公司投资银行部门自然资源和能源转型主管，接替升任该业务全球主席的 Ray Wood。【原文：Bank of America Corp. hired Morgan Stanley’s Todd Giardinelli as head of natural resources and energy transition within the firm’s investment-banking unit, succeeding Ray Wood, who was elevated to global chair of the business.】

item.title: 吝啬的消费者对印尼的高增长表示怀疑
item.description: 印尼经济正以两年来最快的速度增长。但并非所有消费者都买账。【原文：Indonesia’s economy is growing at its fastest pace in two years. Not all consumers are buying it.】

item.title: 摩根大通因交易繁荣在日本外资银行盈利中名列第一
item.description: 摩根大通公司去年在日本的业绩超过了全球竞争对手，原因是亚洲国家推动改善公司治理，促进了交易热潮。【原文：JPMorgan Chase & Co. out-earned global rivals in Japan last year after capitalizing on a dealmaking spree fueled by the Asian nation’s push to improve corporate governance.】

item.title: 美国数据给美联储走向蒙上阴影，亚洲交易员态度谨慎：市场综述
item.description: 由于美国服务业数据疲软引发了对美联储政策路径的担忧，在华尔街抹去涨幅之后，亚洲股市周三可能难以找到方向。【原文：Asian stocks may struggle for direction on Wednesday after Wall Street erased gains, as weakening US services data raised concerns about the Federal Reserve’s policy path.】

item.title: 美国消费者监管机构考虑允许银行收取数据费
item.description: 消费者金融保护局（Consumer Financial Protection Bureau）一直在与有意制定开放银行业务规则的利益相关者举行会议，据直接了解讨论情况的人士称，该局对允许贷款机构为获取客户数据收费持接受态度。【原文：The Consumer Financial Protection Bureau has been holding meetings with stakeholders interested in shaping a revamped open banking rule, and has come across as being receptive to permitting lenders to charge for access to customer data, according to people with direct knowledge of the discussions.】

item.title: 关税热潮褪去，亚洲集装箱班轮公司利润将下滑
item.description: 亚洲集装箱班轮公司的利润可能刚刚达到顶峰。【原文：Asian container liners’ profits might have just peaked.】

item.title: 美国称前迈阿密热火队工人偷窃勒布朗价值数百万美元的球衣
item.description: 迈阿密热火队的一名前雇员被指控盗窃数百件纪念品并在网上出售，其中包括勒布朗-詹姆斯在全美篮球协会冠军系列赛中穿过的一件球衣，这件球衣后来在拍卖会上以近 400 万美元的价格售出。【原文：A former Miami Heat employee was charged with stealing hundreds of pieces of memorabilia and selling it online, including a jersey worn by LeBron James in the National Basketball Association’s championship series that later sold for nearly $4 million at auction.】

item.title: 据说 YPF 接近收购道达尔的阿根廷页岩资产
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，阿根廷国营油气生产商 YPF SA 接近达成一项协议，从法国道达尔能源公司（TotalEnergies SE）收购页岩油资产。【原文：Argentina’s state-run oil and gas producer YPF SA is close to an agreement to acquire shale oil assets from France’s TotalEnergies SE, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 围绕一个赌注的加密货币市场出现升温迹象
item.description: 艾米丽-梅森（Emily Mason）说："提醒那些生活在岩石下的人们，加密货币 IPO 市场已经升温。Circle 的股价自上市以来已经飙升了 397%，Figure、Bullish、Gemini 和 BitGo 等公司也在伺机而动。它们的业务各不相同，但都与同一股力量息息相关：加密货币情绪。【原文：A reminder for those living under a rock: the market for crypto IPOs has heated up, says Emily Mason.Circle’s stock has jumped 397% since its debut, and names like Figure, Bullish, Gemini, and BitGo are waiting in the wings. They’re different businesses, but they’re all tethered to the same force: crypto sentiment.】

item.title: 市场期待加息，日本央行面临存款机制成本问题
item.description: 随着人们对日本央行将在今年晚些时候加息的猜测不断升温，要求日本央行向其存款机制支付资金的风险越来越大，这可能会给日本央行的财政带来更大压力。【原文：As speculation mounts that the Bank of Japan will raise interest rates later this year, there’s a growing risk that required payments to its deposit facility could put added strain on the bank’s finances.】

item.title: 对美联储降息的押注席卷美国债券市场
item.description: 债券交易员正在加大对美联储今年降息的押注，因为美国经济疲软的迹象增强了央行按照唐纳德-特朗普总统的要求降低借贷成本的理由。【原文：Bond traders are ramping up bets on the Federal Reserve cutting interest rates this year, as signs of a weakening US economy bolster the case for the central bank to reduce borrowing costs as demanded by President Donald Trump.】

item.title: AMD 预测显示中国出口限制的影响仍在持续
item.description: 全球第二大人工智能加速器芯片制造商美国先进微器件公司（Advanced Micro Devices Inc.【原文：Advanced Micro Devices Inc., the second-largest maker of AI accelerator chips, gave a stronger-than-expected sales forecast for the current period but warned that its access to the crucial China market remains uncertain.】

item.title: 企业债务销售额突破 1 万亿美元，创 2020 年以来最快速度
item.description: 大量债务即将到期、美国领导人难以捉摸以及收益率下降，迫使企业借款人今年以 2020 年大流行病债务狂潮以来最快的速度出售债务。【原文：A massive wall of debt coming due, an unpredictable US leader and falling yields have compelled corporate borrowers to sell debt this year at the fastest clip since the pandemic debt binge of 2020.】

item.title: 超微报告称服务器需求延迟导致销售低迷
item.description: 超微计算机公司（Super Micro Computer Inc.该公司股价在延时交易中下跌。【原文：Super Micro Computer Inc. reported quarterly sales that fell short of estimates, suggesting the company continues to face uneven uptake of servers amid a shift to products based on new Nvidia Corp. chips. The shares declined in extended trading.】

item.title: MercadoLibre 股价回升，投资者摆脱了利润下滑的影响
item.description: MercadoLibre 公司第二季度报告的利润未达预期，但投资者对这家拉美电子商务巨头的长期战略信心十足。【原文：MercadoLibre Inc. investors brushed off a second-quarter report that missed estimates for profit, betting on the Latin American e-commerce giant’s long-term strategy.】

item.title: 广告故障导致 Snap 第二季度销售额下滑
item.description: Snap 公司公布的第二季度销售额低于华尔街的平均预期，原因是该公司是 Snapchat 照片分享应用的所有者，其广告购买工具出现了技术问题，导致收入增长放缓。【原文：Snap Inc. reported second-quarter sales that were shy of Wall Street’s average estimates as the company, owner of the Snapchat photo-sharing app, dealt with a technical issue with its ad-buying tools that slowed revenue growth.】

item.title: 在作出乐观预测后，Match 计划进行 5000 万美元的产品投资
item.description: Match Group Inc. 公布了好于预期的第三季度销售预测，并承诺投资 5000 万美元用于产品开发，这表明这家约会应用公司在经历了长达一年的收入低迷之后，开始出现转机。【原文：Match Group Inc. provided a better-than-expected third-quarter sales forecast and pledged to invest $50 million in product development, suggesting the beginnings of a turnaround at the dating-app company following a yearlong revenue slump.】

item.title: 开放门户首席执行官希望充分利用 "备忘录-股票 "时刻
item.description: Opendoor Technologies Inc. 多年来一直处于亏损状态，并面临着退市的可能，而此时它却成为了一只热门股。随后，这家房地产公司在短短几天内大涨 460%。【原文：Opendoor Technologies Inc. was nursing years of losses and grappling with a potential delisting when it became a meme stock. Then, in a matter of days, the real estate company rallied 460%.】

item.title: YPF 首席执行官称阿根廷瓦卡穆埃尔塔页岩钻探将放缓
item.description: 阿根廷最大的原油生产商 YPF SA 公司首席执行官表示，由于公司限制支出，阿根廷瓦卡穆埃尔塔页岩区的石油钻探活动近期将减弱。【原文：Oil-drilling activity in Argentina’s Vaca Muerta shale patch is set to weaken in the near term as companies restrain spending, said the chief executive officer of the region’s biggest crude producer YPF SA.】

item.title: 威廉姆斯首席执行官认为液化天然气将占据美国天然气市场 25% 以上的份额
item.description: 全球最大的管道运营商之一威廉姆斯公司（Williams Cos.【原文：Williams Cos., one of the world’s largest pipeline operators, projects liquid natural gas will expand to become more than 25% of the US gas market in the next decade.】

item.title: 美国指控中国人违反 Nvidia 芯片出口规定
item.description: 据当局称，两名中国公民本周被捕，罪名是他们违反美国出口限制，将英伟达公司生产的价值数千万美元的先进人工智能芯片运往中国。【原文：Two Chinese nationals were arrested this week on charges that they sent tens of millions of dollars worth of advanced AI chips made by Nvidia Corp. to China in violation of US export restrictions, according to authorities.】

item.title: 卡尼承诺为受特朗普冲击的木材行业提供 8.7 亿美元援助
item.description: 加拿大总理马克-卡尼（Mark Carney）承诺提供多达 7 亿加元（约合 5.08 亿美元）的贷款担保，以支持加拿大的木材业。【原文：Prime Minister Mark Carney promised as much as C$700 million ($508 million) in loan guarantees to shore up Canada’s lumber industry, which has been hit hard by US duties that are about to significantly increase.】

item.title: Roku 首次推出月租 2.99 美元的无广告视频服务，目标用户是对成本敏感的用户
item.description: Roku 公司推出了一项新的订阅视频服务，为该公司流媒体盒和 Roku 电视的用户提供无广告内容，而且价格比许多点播流媒体竞争对手更低。【原文：Roku Inc. introduced a new subscription video service that offers ad-free content to owners of the company’s streaming boxes and Roku TVs for less money than many on-demand streaming competitors.】

item.title: 少数阿达赫债券持有人反对与爱尔兰大亨库尔森达成重组协议
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，阿达赫集团（Ardagh Group SA）的一小部分债权人正在对该包装公司与大多数债务人达成的重组协议进行反击。【原文：A small cohort of Ardagh Group SA creditors is pushing back on the restructuring deal agreed to by the packaging company and most of its debtholders, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 本周首次拍卖反应冷淡，国债市场萎靡不振
item.description: 在本周三次新票据和债券拍卖中的第一次拍卖后，国债市场仍处于守势，多数收益率当天略有上升。【原文：The Treasuries market remained on the defensive — with most yields slightly higher on the day — after the first of this week’s three auctions of new notes and bonds saw poor demand.】

item.title: 马斯克寻求撤销有关其出售 75 亿美元特斯拉股票的诉讼
item.description: 特斯拉公司（Tesla Inc. ）联合创始人埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）敦促特拉华州法官驳回一起投资者诉讼，该诉讼指控马斯克在获得电动汽车制造商将无法实现 2022 年生产和交付目标的内部消息后，不当出售了超过 75 亿美元的股票。【原文：Tesla Inc. co-founder Elon Musk urged a Delaware judge to toss an investor lawsuit alleging he improperly sold more than $7.5 billion in shares after receiving inside information that the electric-car maker would miss its production and delivery targets in 2022.】

item.title: 亚马逊将首次向客户提供 OpenAI 模型
item.description: 亚马逊公司（Amazon.com Inc. ）计划向客户提供 OpenAI 新的开放式人工智能模型，这是该云计算巨头首次提供这家领先的人工智能初创公司的产品。【原文：Amazon.com Inc. plans to make OpenAI’s new open artificial intelligence models available to customers, the first time the cloud computing giant has offered products from the leading AI startup.】

item.title: DeepSeek 成功后，OpenAI 发布开放重量模型
item.description: 在中国的 DeepSeek 以其开放式人工智能软件赢得全球关注几个月后，OpenAI 发布了一对可模仿人类推理过程的开放式免费人工智能模型。【原文：OpenAI is releasing a pair of open and freely available artificial intelligence models that can mimic the human process of reasoning, months after China’s DeepSeek gained global attention with its own open AI software.】

item.title: 对美国通胀数据的不信任威胁到价值 2 万亿美元的市场
item.description: 据债券投资者称，如果美国劳工统计局被政治化，与美国通胀数据挂钩的 2 万亿美元证券市场可能成为国债的第一个破裂领域。【原文：A $2 trillion market for securities linked to US inflation data could be the first area of Treasuries that would crack if the Bureau of Labor Statistics is politicized, according to bond investors.】

item.title: Anthropic 在竞争对手 GPT-5 发布之前推出更强大的人工智能模型
item.description: 在竞争对手 OpenAI 即将推出期待已久的 GPT-5 系统之际，Anthropic 发布了其最强大人工智能模型的新版本。【原文：Anthropic is releasing a new version of its most powerful artificial intelligence model as rival OpenAI nears the long-awaited launch of its GPT-5 system.】
